column6: The wall-crawler & hot-head collide in this adventure that finds the duo escaping one sticky situation, only to end up in hot water the very next page!  It's a Spider-Man and Human Torch team-up!
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Tony Daniel | inker:Norman Lee | writer:Jeff Parker | penciller:Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe
